Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

The large purple, black and silver dragon that was Marauder continued to
float silently and majestically above the old Maximal base, like a predator
waiting patiently for the object of its desire to reveal itself.

"Well." Marauder transmitted to the the Maximals, "Where is she?" he voice
was becoming more and more aggressive as time passed as was his posture.

Legacy paused as he scanned the base. Several new Maximal signatures
suddenly sprang to life on his screen. Swiftly he opened communication lines
to Rat trap and Quickstride, "Greetings." Legacy's typically cold voice
intoned across the airwaves, "There is a minion in your vicinity, it has
been given permission to leave."

Meanwhile as Legacy spoke, Marauder moved over towards the opening that
Quckstride and rat Trap had just used to enter the base, as if something had
attracted his attention there.

(TAG)

Preston
(Legacy/Marauder)

--0016367b6d5e6735c7048184fab3
